Our client, a fast growing Financial Information Provider, is now looking for a potential candidate as the followings;

[ Job Duty]
  • Work closely with the Managing Director in Hong Kong to develop and implement sales strategies
  • Generate leads, conduct cold calls & demos and build strong relationships with prospects & clients in order to achieve sales targets
  • Manage pipelines, project sales forecast and maintain Customer Relationship Management records
  • Provide feedback to product development & marketing team for formulating product development & marketing strategies
  • Build a strong understanding of the product’s value and knowledge

[Requirement]

  • Minimum 5 years of sales and business development experience within Asia
  • Experience working in a bank, securities firm, consulting firm, PE fund, financial solution vendors, is highly desirable.
  • (Candidate with more experience will be considered as a Sales Director)
  • A proven track record of value-based selling
  • Excellent communication skills and a forward-thinking attitude making growth of the company
  • Good in spokent and written English, Cantonese / Mandarin


Interested parties please send your resume to hongkong@rgf-hragent.asia

My client is a leading Electronic Accessories Manufacturer in the industry and they are actively looking for an experienced Administration & Operation Manager in their expanding team.


Job Responsibilities:

  • Lead and monitor the overall operations in project development and order schedule of the orders from major customers
  • Responsible for Recruitment, Staff Attendance and Staff Performance Appraisal
  • Assist to prepare PowerPoint presentation and reports consolidation and various documents
  • Provide Administrative support such as equipment maintenance, printing material supplies, inventory control of stationery and daily necessity, collecting and submitting expense statements and reimbursements, etc.
  • Coordinate events and meetings with internal / external parties, prepare agenda, minutes, report, meeting material and handle follow up works
  • Provide Secretarial Support to Senior Management


Job Requirements:

  • F.7 or above
  • Minimum 5 years relevant experience in Trading and Manufacturing 
  • Solid experience in Project Management and Oder Processing in Manufacturing companies will be an advantage
  • Good command of spoken English, Cantonese and Mandarin
  • Proficiency in PC skills, including MS Word, Excel, Power Point & Chinese word processing
  • Immediately available is preferred


Company Profile

A leading Electronics Accessories Manufacturer and Exporter which headquartered in Hong Kong and Manufacturing facilities in Dongguan (China) and provides a wide range of Electronics and Computer Accessories. Their clients base covers North America, Japan, Europe and Asia with more than 10 years' development. 


If you are interested please submit your CV in Word / PDF format. 

All information received will be kept in strict confidential and only for recruitment purpose.

Khách hàng RGF
Loại hình công ty: 100% công ty của Nhật
Nganh nghe kinh doanh: 
 
Mô tả công việc
- Phiên dịch cho các chuyên gia, Trưởng phòng Bộ phận sản xuất, Bộ phận quản lý công đoạn

Yêu cầu chung:
- Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành tiếng Nhật
- Trình độ tiếng Nhật từ N2 trở lên

- Có thể đi đào tạo tại Nhật theo yêu cầu của bộ phận
- Có kỹ năng giao tiếp và xử lý các tình huống

The Role is:

  • Responsible for driving the core revenue streams which include consumer based products and membership sales for health and fitness, swimming and retail
  • Responsible for delivering sales and customer service training
  • Accountable for achieving the sales, income and profit targets for the core brands
  • Required to develop the sales systems and employee incentive rewards programmes to enhance sales performance
  • Required to maximise lead generation, improve enquiry conversions and upsell products
  • Required to develop and deliver a sales pipeline with accurate financial forecasting
  • Working on a national basis, liaising with and motivating site sales teams daily.

The successful Candidate will:

  • Be degree educated or equivalent, financially astute with proven commercial acumen
  • Have proven success working in a fast paced, highly pressured national sales role
  • Demonstrable experience in developing effective sales systems that underpin sales performance
  • Have experience of managing a networked sales force, working remotely as required
  • Demonstrable problem solving and analytical skills, able to interpret sales performance information
  • Ability to present or train to large groups of people
  • Ability to demonstrate knowledge of or personal passion for the sport and leisure industry.

Front Office, Application Support Engineer


Company:

Global Investment Bank, Large-Size, Highly Stable


Team Organization:

APAC Production Services


Overview:

You will be responsible for providing Level 1 and 2 APAC application support for the front office business users and application systems. Being involved in the application support, incident, problem and capacity management, you will be working closely with development teams for additional support.


Responsibilities:

  • Be responsible for tracking application issues, incident management, release management and resolution
  • Take measures for Risk Management, to proactively identify and address IT risks before impact
  • Involvement in BCP / DR management with global teams
  • Communicate on application support and changes with development teams
  • Continuously understand and learn about all aspects of the Financial Services business


Requirements:

  • At least 4 years’ experience in an application support role in Investment Banking or Financial Services
  • Experience or working knowledge with Sybase, Oracle, SQL, UNIX, and Java
  • Experience working in a front office environment, or a fast pace environment is a plus
  • Experience with Autosys and TIBCO Middleware would be beneficial
  • You must be able to communicate in business level English and Japanese

JobListing.ContactDetails: Johnson & Johnson K. K. Medical Company

JobListing.JobFullDescription:
Description
Position Summary:
We are looking for a Performance Engineer who has 6-8 years of experience working with software performance projects. The ideal candidate can understand the scope of new product features and work with the various teams to come up with performance testing strategies to optimize the software. 
 
Responsibilities:

§  Design and implement performance test infrastructure for SAAS projects.
  • Design, implement, and run performance test scenarios to measure performance, scalability and resiliency
  • Work with the rest of the performance team to develop performance analysis and automation tools
  • Debug and fix issues with performance tools and environment
  • Develop and review performance test plans for complex product features
  • Work closely with engineering to isolate and communicate performance issues
  • Understand and develop performance test cases depending on product features

 Requirements:

  • BS/MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, or equivalent
  • Performance and Load Testing experience
  • Strong experience with Linux; specifically, the ability to diagnose software issues on a server environment
  • Prior experience in development of performance measurement and analysis tools e.g. logparser, monitoring dashboards is a definite plus.
  • Ability to work independently with minimal supervision
  • Proficiency in modern development, such as Java
  • Good understanding of databases preferably Oracle

Good to have: 
Experience with the following technology – Java, Jboss ,Oracle, NodeJS, LoadRunner, JMeter, Redis, MongoDB or other NoSQL DB,  JProfiler

Experience : 6 – 8 years
Qualification : BE / B.Tech/ MS / MCA

2 - 4 years of Software Development experience with a strong technical background 

Experience in Test automation framework, Ranorex knowledge is desirable 

Agile/Scrum development experience will be an asset. 

Healthcare domain knowledge will be an asset. 


Knowledge/Competencies:


Proficiency in C#/.NET, Ranorex (or similar Test Automation framework/tool), Design and development, OOAD and Design Patterns etc 

Unit test / Integration test experience. 

Awareness of Quality Standards like CMMi / ISO9001 / ISO 13485 is desirable
JobListing.ContactDetails: Siemens Technology and Services Pvt Ltd
